description: Create an in-app flyout/sheet component that displays Beacon Network status and correlation results when user errors occur

acceptanceCriteria: Sheet/Modal component from shadcn/ui is used

subtasks.description: Implement TanStack Query to fetch Beacon Network status
Display real-time provider status with visual indicators
Display correlation results when user errors occur
acceptanceCriteria: User-specific errors show 'Your app issue' message
Global outages show 'GLOBAL OUTAGE DETECTED' message

messages.globalOutage: GLOBAL OUTAGE DETECTED - Our Beacon Network confirms this is a provider-wide issue

subtasks.description: Implement real-time updates via Convex subscriptions
acceptanceCriteria: UI updates automatically when status changes
Beacon Network status is displayed in real-time
Provider status indicators are clear and visual
Correlation results are shown when errors occur
Component updates automatically via Convex subscriptions
UI is responsive and matches design system
implementationNotes: Use shadcn/ui Sheet component for the flyout
Ensure component is accessible (keyboard navigation, ARIA labels)
Use Convex useQuery for real-time subscriptions
Display correlation results prominently when available
Consider adding a refresh button for manual updates
